name: The Stone Man 2 - Skill Point Game Jam 2019
name_original: The Stone Man 2 - Skill Point Game Jam 2019
description:
You can switch scenes using 1,2,3 or 4.
On the first scene, you can spawn a tram by pressing B, hold space bar to flip over the stone.
On the second scene mash space bar to flip over the stone, then you can press N to move on with the trip.

Enjoy!
